page.title: 17WARNES SHOP,ALASDAIR RITCHIE
page.content: MR WARNES OWNS THE ONLY LARGE SHOP IN OUR SURVEY AREA:IT IS VERY IMPORTANT TO THE LOCAL PEOPLE.MR WARNES HAS OWNED THE SHOP FOR 14 YEARS. THE SHOP OPENS FROM 7:30AM TO 5:30PM EVERY WEEK DAY. SATURDAY IS THE BUSIEST DAY AND ON AVERAGE THE SHOP HAS 250 CUSTOMERS A DAY .MR WARNES SELLS GROCERIES AND MEAT.HE MAKES AND SELLS 9 DIFFERENT KINDS OF SAUSAGES AND 5 KINDS OF PIES.HE HAS A SPECIAL BUYER WHO CHOOSES MEAT AT COLCHESTER AND IPSWICH MARKETS. EIGHT PEOPLE WORK IN THE SHOP ,ALL FROM WIX OR LOCAL VILLAGES. MR WARNES HAS ONE LORRY LOAD OF GROCERIES DELIVERED EACH WEEK AND HE ALSO GOES TO COLLECT GROCERIES FROM THE CASH AND CARRY STORE IN COLCHESTER. ABOUT 50% OF HIS CUSTOMERS COME FROM WIX, THE REST FROM SURROUNDING VILLAGES.
